Let me know if you would like me to make any adjustments. I had to make a few decisions to maximize the use of the available 400 word limit.
(you have to format, and also you should naturally broke the text, see meta\_text) 
Have you clearly understood the task? You need to format it correctly (see markdown specifications, and then you should rethink and rewrite the text to make it sound a bit more professional, such as using verbs, making is concise and these kinds of things. You were not supposed to summarize the content but to rewrite it.
I would be happy to assist you.
If you need me to cover anything or correct anything let me know.
The main aim of this problem is to show you and make you see how seriously translators and editors are treated in a company! Since they add a lot
